about_the_game:
EQUAL PEOPLE

Welcome to the City of Neapolis.
You are here to solve a Mystery.
Talk to People and Get Clues.

Go on Quests and Side-Missions.

The Game Text and Voices are Generated by Artificial Intelligence.

The City is Procedurally Generated.

To Move around Quicker, You can Drive the 'Parked' Cars.

There is also a Parkour Mini-Game.

The Game uses the GPU Melting Power of Unreal Engine 5.1 to generate Hyper Photorealistic People and Environments.

-------------------------------
*** Challenges ***
"Easter Egg" Challenge - How many Archor Games Related Items Appear in the Game ?
"Speed Run" Challenge - What is the Fastest Time You can finish ?
"Scenic" Pictures Challenge - Take Screenshots of the Beautiful Area and share them on Social Media with Your Friends.
"Walkthrough" Challenge - Post a video of a Complete 'Walkthrough' of the entire Game.
Walk Don't Run Challenge - Only Walk (No Sprinting) and No "High/Sprint" Jumps for the Entire Game and Post Your Full Video online.

"Steamy Streamer" Challenge - Get ALL of the Archor Games products available on Steam and Stream ALL of them Beginning to End.

"IRL ARG" Challenge - This game and other ARCHOR GAMES are part of an "Alternate Reality Game" "In Real Life" Challenge, be sure to check out ALL of our games for Clues to the Mystery.
